article_text: An uninsured Miami Gardens man with diabetes that resulted in an amputated toe sees his experience as symbolic of the stakes in the Florida Legislature’s disagreements over Medicaid expansion.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Medicaid expansion, Low Income Pool, LIP, Memorial Healthcare System, uninsured, coverage gap
article_metadata.description: An uninsured Miami Gardens man with diabetes that resulted in an amputated toe sees his experience as symbolic of the stakes in the Florida Legislature’s disagreements over Medicaid expansion.
article_metadata.title: Access to care: Could Medicaid have helped Miami man avoid amputation? | Miami Herald
